trivia

Class Actors

  • java.lang.Object
    • trivia.Actors

  • public class Actors
extends java.lang.Object
    Container for all Actors. Handles updating and drawing of all contained Actors.
    Author:
    Cody Swendrowski, Dan Miller

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Actors(GameEngine gameEngine)
      Creates a new container of Actor.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(Actor a)
        Adds a created Actor to actors.
        Parameters:
        a - Actor to be added

      • handleActors

        public void handleActors(int ms)
        Moves and checks for death all actors which are alive. Removes all dead actors. All arraylist iterations are first converted to array to avoid concurrent modification.

      • drawActors

        public void drawActors(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Calls the draw method of all Actors.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics to be drawn with

      • getArrayList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Actor> getArrayList()
        Returns current ArrayList of actors
        Returns:
        actors

      • addTriangle

        public void addTriangle(int destination,
               int x,
               int y)
        Adds a Triangle to Actors.
        Parameters:
        destination - Where the Triangle should move to horizontally
        x - X position to spawn at
        y - Y position to spawn at

      • addSquare

        public void addSquare(int destination,
             int x,
             int y)
        Adds a Square to Actors.
        Parameters:
        destination - Where the Square should move to horizontally
        x - X position to spawn at
        y - Y position to spawn at

      • addParticle

        public void addParticle(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float center,
               java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float vectorSpeed,
               java.awt.Color c)
        Adds a Particle to Actors.
        Parameters:
        center - The point to spawn at
        vectorSpeed - The speed of the Particle both horizontally and vertically
        c - The color of the Particle

      • setEngine

        public void setEngine(GameEngine e)
        Sets the GameEngine to utilize.
        Parameters:
        e - engine to set to

      • setEvade

        public void setEvade(int e)
        Sets the evade chance to update Triangles to.
        Parameters:
        e - evade chance, on the scale of 0 to 100, with 100 being always evade and 0 being never evade.

      • fireBullet

        public void fireBullet(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float center,
              java.awt.Color drawClr,
              java.awt.geom.Point2D.Float velocity)
        Adds a Bullet to actors.
        Parameters:
        center - Location to spawn at
        drawClr - Color to draw with
        velocity - Speed of Bullet

      • fire

        public void fire()
        Signals that FightingActors can fire at each other.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the arrayList of all current actors. Called when the player starts a new set of questions.
